title: LA-23-12: Identifying and Preventing Violations of 18 U.S.C. § 208 Arising from Digital Asset Ownership
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/DECB4A1E3270471785258A3700681B21/$FILE/LA-23-12 - Identifying and Preventing Violations of 18 U.S.C. 208 Arising from Digital Asset Ownership.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory provides guidance on when an employee may have a disqualifying financial interest under 18 U.S.C. § 208 arising from ownership of digital assets.
